content.title: Arterial Tortuosity Syndrome
content.description: Rare autosomal recessive connective tissue disorder with extreme arterial tortuosity and elongation.
content.clinical_pearl: Severe tortuosity on imaging should prompt consideration of ATS; genetic testing confirms diagnosis
